artist: Designer: Jack Larsen; Mill: Jack Lenor Larsen Inc.; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Vertical stripes in a variety of threads and colors: yellows, greens, gold, natural, off-white, metallic gold 2 Gold warp. Gold dominates in weft with yellow, lt. olive, metallic gold & silver, black. Plain weave variation. Stapled inside 11 x 8.5" folder with Larsen descriptive label. "H-2" printed on outside. (gold)

title: Fantasy
